tx_servicemgr::fetchConfigValue ( $  param  ) 

Fetches configuration value from flexform. If value exists, value in $this->conf is replaced with this value.

Author:
Dmitry Dulepov <dmitry@typo3.org>
Parameters:
string $param Parameter name. If . is found, the first part is section name, second is key (applies only to $this->conf)
Returns:
void
